==Description==
The Leaf Stone is a type of [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item]] that is first encountered in the [[Kanto]] Region.
==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom || [[File:Vileplume.png|40px]] Vileplume |- | [[File:Weepinbell.png|40px]] Weepinbell || [[File:Victreebel.png|40px]] Victreebel |- | [[File:Exeggcute.png|40px]] Exeggcute || [[File:Exeggutor.png|40px]] Exeggutor |- | [[File:Nuzleaf.png|40px]] Nuzleaf || [[File:Shiftry.png|40px]] Shiftry |- | [[File:Pansage.png|40px]] Pansage || [[File:Simisage.png|40px]] Simisage |- | [[File:Exeggcute.png|40px]] Exeggcute || [[File:Alolan Exeggutor.png|40px]] Alolan Exeggutor |}
==Mine Layout== The Leaf Stone appears in the Underground as a 3x4 sized object.

[[File:LeafStoneMine.png|100px]]
